title: Pipes and Posts
description:
This week, Meredith and Patton dedicate the entire episode to answering your emails and speakpipes!

Have something interesting you'd like to share? Email us at HeyDidYouGetMyText@gmail.com, or leave us a message at speakpipe.com/didyougetmytext.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
